<scrape-tool>
Convert websites to Markdown format for content analysis.

<best-practices>
- Always use full URLs: https://example.com (not example.com)
- For failed/insufficient content, use browser tools for visual capture
- Content over 60K chars is auto-truncated; use `download` to save full source
- Uses Firecrawl API if configured, otherwise falls back to MarkItDown
</best-practices>
</scrape-tool>
